mapper.select:
select TA.bizcd, TA.license_cd, TA.license_pd_st as lcns_st, TA.license_pd_ed as lcns_dt from tb_license_used TB inner join tb_license TA on TA.bizcd = TB.bizcd and TA.license_cd = TB.license_cd and TA.seq = TB.pseq
TB.license_encode_data = #{usedUserLicenseUUID}

SELECT seq, bizcd, license_cd, reg_date, updt_date, license_no, license_title, license_pd_st as lcns_st, license_pd_ed as lcns_dt, license_count FROM tb_license
license_no = #{license_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_license_used ( bizcd, license_cd, reg_date, updt_date, license_encode_data, pseq ) value( #{bizcd}, #{license_cd}, now(), now(), #{usedUserLicenseUUID}, #{seq} )
